column4: Hi people, maybe this is not the best place to ask for it but... Does anybody knows that site where users can vote for proposals for a project? I remember that users could vote for things that, if they had enough votes, they'll be implemented in following releases.
are you thinking of the ubuntu idea-torrent? http://brainstorm.ubuntu.com/
yes! exactly! But i think there was another one, more general, where you can even create your own "brainstorm"
you can create your own "Ideas" on that page.  then have people (including yourself) propose solutions, vote, etc..
